jobDescription: Build and grow a secure platform supporting Avalara's expanding business.  Develop high-quality software programs, review designs, write efficient code, perform code reviews and unit tests, collaborate with cross-functional teams, optimize programs for distributed systems, and participate in agile development.
preferredQualifications: Participation in coding contests (CodeForces, SPOJ, CodeChef, Topcoder, Code Gladiator, Hackathons)
